page.title: 15PUBLIC TRANSPORT
page.content: PUBLIC TRANSPORT IN OUR AREA IS NOT VERY GOOD, SO MOST FAMILIES HAVE TO HAVE CARS OR BIKES. NONE OF THE VILLAGES HAS ANY DECENT SIZED SHOPS, SO YOU HAVE TO HAVE TRANSPORT TO GO SHOPPING. MOST FAMILIES GO TO OSWESTRY OR WREXHAM TO SHOP AND USUALLY GO ON THURSDAY OR FRIDAY NIGHT WHEN THE SHOPS STAY OPEN LATE. WHEN PEOPLE GO TO WORK, THE BUSES DON'T RUN OFTEN ENOUGH, SO THEY HAVE TO GO BY CAR OR BIKE. THE BUSES ARE VERY EXPENSIVE. IT COSTS ABOUT Â£1.50 TO GO TO WREXHAM OR OSWESTRY. WHEN OUR MUMS GO SHOPPING, THESE ARE THE SORTS OF THINGS SHE BUYS:BREAD,MEAT,POTATOES,VEGETABLES, FRUIT,BREAKFAST CEREALS,CAT AND DOG FOOD,JAM,MARMALADE,FISH FINGERS, BEEFBURGERS,PIZZAS,LEMONADE AND TOILET ROLLS.
